newsitem.title: USA: Boston Beer Co Inc Q4 shr shrinks.
newsitem.headline: Boston Beer Co Inc Q4 shr shrinks.

text.p: Three Months Ended Fiscal Year Ended

NOTES - (a) Operating income decreased primarily as a result of a change in the operating method of handling returnable bottles and an increase of $1.8 million in allowance for uncollectable accounts.
(b) Includes a non-recurring gain of $807,000 ($0.02 per share after taxes) related to the sale of certain distribution rights to a major metropolitan area.

(c) Pro forma data for the period ended December 31, 1995 is presented to reflect the recapitalization of the company in conjuction with its initial public offering, on November 20, 1995, which resulted in the issuance of 3,109,279 shares of common stock and a change in the tax status of the entity from a partnership to a corporation. Pro forma earning per share is based on the weighted average number of common and common equivalent shares outstanding during the period, assuming a conversion of partnership units.
